value: [{"url": "https://christinestravelgems.com/visit-paris-dont-miss-these-10-unique-experiences/", "title": "Visit Paris: Don't Miss These 10 Unique Experiences - Travel Gems", "content": "Visit Paris: Don't Miss These 10 Unique Experiences - Travel Gems Image 13: Eiffel Tower View From Trocadero Gardens in Paris Image 18: Visit D'Orsay Museum in Paris ### Planning Your Visit to D’Orsay Museum in Paris Image 20: Visit Sacré-Cœur Basilica in Paris Image 22: View of Eiffel Tower From Sacré-Cœur in Paris Image 24: Visit the Wall of Love in Montmartre, Paris 5. Visit the Catacombs of Paris ### Planning Your Visit to the Catacombs of Paris ### Planning Your Visit to the Palace at Versailles From Paris 9. Visit Luxembourg Gardens in Paris Image 54: Christine Visiting Luxembourg Gardens in Paris Image 56: Luxembourg Garden Fountain in Paris ### Planning Your Visit to Luxembourg Gardens in Paris Save.%20So,%20my%20goal%20is%20to%20help%20you%20look%20beyond%20the%20surface%20and%20get%20the%20most%20out%20of%20your%20own%20visit%20to%20Paris.%20I%20am%20dedicating%20this%20post%20to%20some%20of%20the%20unique%20experiences%20I%20have%20come%20across%20in%20the%20grand%20capital%20of%20France.%20***Disclaimer:%20Don%E2%80%99t%20forget%20to%20check%20the%20entry%20restrictions%20for%20France%20as%20well%20as%20any%20activity%20you%20would%20like%20to%20participate%20in%20before%20booking%20any%20part%20of%20your%20journey.%201.%20Learn%20to%20Make%20Macarons%20Like%20a%20True%20Parisian%20Oh%20man,%20this%20class%20was%20tons%20fun%20and%20I%20learned%20so%20much!%20While%20I%20have%20attempted%20to%20make%20macarons%20a%20few%20times%20at%20home,%20I%20have%20not%20had%20very%20much%20success.%20I%20found%20this%20class%20to%20be%20well%20organized%20and%20incredibly%20insightful.%20And,%20I%20am%20confident%20that%20I%20have%20a%20better%20concept%20for%20how%20to%20approach%20macarons%20in%20the%20future.%20This%20is%20a%20hands%20on,%20creative%20activity%20ideal%20for%20all%20types%20of%20travelers.%20So,%20it%20doesn%E2%80%99t%20matter%20whether%20you%20are%20an%20individual,%20a%20couple,%20or%20traveling%20with%20the%20whole%20family!%20(Side%20note:%20This%20is%20great%20if%20you%20have%20kids%20who%20are%20late%20elementary%20or%20older,%20but%20very%20young%20children%20might%20not%20do%20so%20well%20with%20this%20activity.)%20Before%20you%20begin%20making%20these%20tasty%20treats,%20you%20are%20given%20the%20option%20to%20choose%20which%20color%20you%20want%20for%20your%20macaron%20shell%20as%20well%20as%20which%20flavor%20you%20would%20like%20for%20your%20filling.%20Personally,%20I%20chose%20teal%20blue%20shells%20with%20orange%20blossom%20filling.%20(other%20filling%20flavors%20included%20vanilla,%20chocolate,%20berry,%20lemon,%20etc.).%20Additionally,%20you%20can%20have%20an%20opportunity%20to%20experiment%20with%20the%20shape/size%20of%20your%20macaron%20shells.%20I%20attempted%20to%20make%20hearts%20and%20flowers,%20but%20I%E2%80%99m%20not%20sure%20that%20they%20were%20overly%20successful.%20%F0%9F%98%9BOf%20course,%20the%20best%20part%20is,%20getting%20to%20take%20home%20an%20entire%20box%20of%20freshly%20baked%20tasty%20treats.%20(Yum!)%20They%20made%20the%20perfect%20little%20snack%20over%20the%20next%20few%20days%20in%20Paris.%20Booking%20Your%20Macaron%20Baking%20Experience%20I%20booked%20this%20specific%20course%20through%20AirBnB%20Experiences%20and%20I%20would%20definitely%20recommend%20it.%20Alternatively,%20you%20can%20check%20out%20the%20other%20options%20on%20AirBnbs%20website,%20GetYourGuide,%20or%20Viator.%20Also,%20for%20reference,%20the%20same%20company%20offers%20a%20croissant%20baking%20course,%20a%20lemon%20pie%20baking%20course,%20and%20more.%202.%20Views%20of%20the%20Eiffel%20Tower%20The%20Eiffel%20Tower%20is%20one%20of%20the%20most%20iconic%20sites%20in%20Paris.%20Personally,%20I%20had%20never%20dreamed%20of%20seeing%20it%20for%20myself,%20but%20I%20will%20never%20forget%20the%20first%20time%20it%20came%20into%20my%20view.%20I%20found%20myself%20surprisingly%20overcome%20with%20excitement%20and%20awe.%20Throughout%20my%20life,%20I%20had%20seen%20this%20magnificent%20structure%20time%20and%20time%20again%20in%20movies,%20TV%20shows,%20books,%20and%20as%20a%20graphic%20on%20just%20about%20anything%20you%20can%20think%20of%20(shirts,%20pillows,%20plates,%20office%20supplies,%20cups,%20etc.).%20I%20certainly%20never%20expected%20this%20kind%20of%20reaction,%20but%20it%20was%20one%20of%20the%20first%20moments%20when%20I%20knew%20that%20Paris%20had%20stolen%20my%20heart.%20That%20said,%20I%20know%20that%20not%20everyone%20will%20have%20the%20same%20kind%20of%20reaction.%20But,%20it%E2%80%99s%20still%20one%20of%20the%20most%20famous/highly%20recognizable%20structures%20in%20the%20world,%20and%20it%20is%20something%20which%20should%20not%20be%20missed%20while%20in%20Paris.%20Enjoy%20Beautiful%20Views%20of%20the%20Eiffel%20Tower%20for%20Free%20If%20you%20are%20looking%20for%20a%20free%20way%20to%20enjoy%20the%20Eiffel%20Tower,%20here%20is%20a%20short%20list%20of%20places%20with%20unique%20views%20of%20the%20Eiffel%20Tower.%20You%20can%20click%20on%20any%20of%20the%20links%20to%20pull%20the%20locations%20up%20in%20Google%20Maps.%201.%20Avenue%20de%20Camoens%20%E2%80%93%20This%20was%20such%20a%20fun%20place%20to%20shoot%20some%20unique%20photos.%20The%20picture%20above%20and%20on%20the%20left%20hand%20side%20was%20taken%20from%20this%20vantage%20point.%202.%20Pont%20de%20Bir%20Hakeim%20%E2%80%93%20This%20is%20a%20cute%20little%20bridge%20where%20the%20Metro%20and%20cars%20can%20cross%20over%20the%20Seine.%20There%20is%20also%20a%20statue%20called%20La%20France%20Renaissante%20(Renaissance%20France)%20located%20in%20the%20center%20of%20the%20bridge.%20The%20photo%20below%20includes%20the%20tower,%20the%20statue,%20and%20the%20bridge.%203.%20Jardins%20du%20Trocad%C3%A9ro/Place%20du%20Trocad%C3%A9ro%20(please%20note%20that%20the%20Square%20was%20under%20construction%20when%20I%20visited%20in%20Apr%202022.%20But,%20the%20gardens%20were%20open.)%20%E2%80%93%20The%20Trocad%C3%A9ro%20gardens%20are%20particularly%20beautiful%20in%20the%20spring.%20The%20photo%20above%20and%20on%20the%20right%20hand%20side%20(with%20the%20flowers)%20was%20taken%20from%20this%20vantage%20point.%204.%20Champ%20de%20Mars%20%E2%80%93%20This%20is%20the%20park%20where%20the%20Eiffel%20Tower%20resides%20and%20there%20are%20many%20places%20to%20get%20great%20shots%20from%20here.%20Planning%20Your%20Eiffel%20Tower%20Visit%20Of%20course,%20there%20is%20a%20strong%20chance%20that%20you%20will%20want%20to%20climb%20this%20world%20famous%20tower%20as%20well.%20But,%20please%20note%20that%20it%20is%20rather%20expensive%20to%20do%20so%20and%20you%20will%20need%20to%20book%20in%20advance.%20For%20more%20information%20on%20ticketing,%20hours%20of%20operation,%20and%20more%20please%20visit%20the%20official%20Eiffel%20Tower%20Website.%203.%20Visit%20D%E2%80%99Orsay%20Museum%20in%20Paris%20Everyone%20knows%20la%20Louvre%20and%20its%20most%20famous%20painting:%20The%20Mona%20Lisa.%20And,%20while%20la%20Louvre%20is%20beautiful%20and%20has%20magnificent%20artwork%20that%20spans%20centuries,%20in%20my%20own%20(very%20humble%20%F0%9F%98%89%20)%20opinion,%20D%E2%80%99Orsay%20is%20better.%20Reasons%20I%20Love%20D%E2%80%99Orsay%20Planning%20Your%20Visit%20to%20D%E2%80%99Orsay%20Museum%20in%20Paris%20The%20D%E2%80%99Orsay%20Museum%20is%20open%20Tuesday%20%E2%80%93%20Sunday%20with%20extended%20hours%20on%20Thursdays.%20Depending%20on%20the%20time%20of%20year%20that%20you%20are%20visiting,%20I%20encourage%20you%20to%20pre-buy%20your%20tickets%20in%20order%20to%20avoid%20long%20lines.%20For%20more%20information%20on%20opening%20hours,%20ticket%20prices,%20and%20more,%20please%20visit%20their%20official%20website.%204.%20Enjoy%20the%20View%20of%20Paris%20from%20Sacr%C3%A9-C%C5%93ur%20A%20Little%20History%20About%20Sacr%C3%A9-C%C5%93ur%20The%20unique%20basilica%20of%20Sacr%C3%A9-C%C5%93ur%20is%20located%20at%20the%20top%20of%20the%20highest%20point%20in%20Paris:%20Butte%20Montmartre.%20Montmartre%20has%20been%20a%20site%20of%20worship%20dating%20all%20the%20way%20back%20to%20the%20days%20of%20the%20Gallic%20Druids.%20By%20the%209th%20century%20the%20hill%20had%20become%20known%20as%20%E2%80%9CMont%20des%20Martyrs%E2%80%9D%20(Montmartre)%20because%20this%20is%20the%20site%20where%20Saint%20Denis,%20the%20patron%20saint%20of%20France,%20was%20was%20beheaded%20in%20250%20AD.%20Over%20the%20years,%20an%20assortment%20of%20religious%20buildings%20have%20stood%20on%20this%20site,%20lost%20due%20to%20fire,%20ruin,%20or%20other%20events.%20The%20current%20basilica%20was%20designed%20and%20constructed%20between%20the%20years%20of%201876%20and%201912.%20Within%20its%20walls,%20you%20have%20the%20chance%20to%20admire%20one%20of%20the%20largest%20mosaics%20in%20the%20world:%20Christ%20in%20Glory%20by%20Olivier%20Merson,%C2%A0H.%20M.%C2%A0Magne%20and%20R.%20Martin.%20Planning%20Your%20Visit%20to%20Sacr%C3%A9-C%C5%93ur%20In%20order%20to%20avoid%20crowds,%20I%20highly%20recommend%20visiting%20early%20in%20the%20morning.%20For%20more%20information%20on%20opening%20hours,%20bell%20tower%20visits,%20and%20more,%20please%20visit%20the%20official%20Sacr%C3%A9-C%C5%93ur%20website.%20Wall%20of%20Love%20While%20you%E2%80%99re%20in%20Montmartre,%20be%20sure%20to%20stop%20by%20another%20unique%20attraction:%20The%20Wall%20of%20Love%20in%20Jehan%20Rictus%20Garden%20Square.%20It%20is%20only%20a%20few%20minutes%20walk%20downhill%20from%20the%20Sacr%C3%A9-C%C5%93ur.%20On%20the%20expansive%20wall,%20you%20will%20find%20the%20phrase%C2%A0%E2%80%98I%20love%20you%E2%80%99%20311%20times%20written%20in%20250%20languages.%20We%20had%20a%20lot%20of%20fun%20looking%20for%20this%20beautiful%20expression%20in%20all%20of%20the%20languages%20we%20know!%20%3C3%205.%20Visit%20the%20Catacombs%20of%20Paris%20Looking%20to%20learn%20more%20about%20the%20darker/creepier%20side%20of%20history%20in%20Paris?%20Then,%20a%20visit%20to%20the%20Paris%20catacombs%20might%20just%20be%20what%20you%20need.%20Here,%20you%20have%20the%20opportunity%20to%20witness%20the%20solution%20to%20a%20bizarre%20historical%20conundrum:%20what%20to%20do%20about%20Paris%E2%80%99s%20overflowing%20cemeteries.%20The%20problem%20became%20so%20severe%20that%20a%20basement%20wall%20in%20a%20property%20adjoining%20Les%20Innocents%20Cemetery%20collapsed%20under%20the%20weight%20of%20the%20mass%20grave%20behind%20it.%20The%20solution:%20under%20cover%20of%20night,%20the%20cemeteries%20would%20be%20emptied%20and%20the%20remains%20of%20those%20buried%20would%20be%20transferred%20to%20the%20winding%20labyrinths%20of%20abandoned%20mines%20located%20under%20the%20streets%20of%20Paris.%20It%20was%20a%20monumental%20project%20that%20took%20years%20to%20complete.%20At%20first,%20bones%20and%20remains%20were%20tossed%20in%20without%20much%20attention%20or%20care.%20Years%20later,%20Inspector%20H%C3%A9ricart%20de%20Thury,%20Director%20of%20the%20Paris%20Mine%20Inspection%20Service,%20was%20given%20the%20unusual%20task%20of%20rearranging%20the%20bones.%20His%20vision%20created%20patterns%20and%20stacks%20that%20are%20still%20seen%20today.%20It%20was%20not%20until%201809%20that%20the%20Catacombs%20were%20first%20opened%20to%20visitors%20(by%20appointment%20only).%20Over%20the%20years,%20many%20unusual%20events%20have%20occurred%20here%20including:%20concerts,%20meetings%20of%20the%20French%20Resistance%20during%20WWII,%20cinematic%20showings,%20and%20in%202015%20Airbnb%20paid%20%E2%82%AC350,000%20to%20offer%20two%20customers%20the%20chance%20to%20stay%20overnight%20in%20the%20Catacombs%20on%20Oct.%2031st.%20Planning%20Your%20Visit%20to%20the%20Catacombs%20of%20Paris%20Altogether,%20I%20would%20suggest%20that%20it%20will%20take%20approximately%201%20hour%20to%20visit%20the%20Paris%20Catacombs.%20Nowadays,%20the%20Catacombs%20are%20open%20Tuesday%20through%20Sunday.%20It%20is%20possible%20to%20buy%20your%20tickets%20for%20full%20price%20in%20advance.%20Alternatively,%20you%20can%20wait%20until%20the%20day-of%20and%20purchase%20your%20tickets%20for%20half%20price.%20The%20only%20issue%20with%20this%20is%20that%20you%20run%20the%20risk%20of%20them%20being%20sold%20out.%20This%20even%20happened%20to%20me%20while%20I%20was%20visiting%20in%20the%20off-season%20and%20I%20ended%20up%20having%20to%20rearrange%20my%20schedule%20and%20visit%20on%20a%20different%20day.%20For%20more%20information%20on%20ticket%20prices,%20opening%20hours,%20and%20more,%20please%20visit%20the%20official%20website.%206.%20Day%20Trip%20to%20The%20Palace%20of%20Versailles%20I%E2%80%99ve%20been%20to%20the%20Palace%20of%20Versailles%20twice%20now%20and%20just%20like%20Paris,%20I%20would%20keep%20going%20back%20again%20and%20again.%20I%20really%20do%20love%20it%20that%20much.%20The%20first%20time%20I%20visited%20was%20with%20my%20husband%20in%20winter.%20The%20advantage%20of%20this%20was%20that%20it%20was%20a%20bit%20less%20crowded%20and%20we%20had%20a%20wonderful%20tour%20of%20the%20palace%20interior.%20However,%20it%20was%20really%20quite%20cold,%20dreary,%20and%20rainy%20outside.%20The%20fountains%20were%20turned%20off,%20the%20statues%20covered%20for%20winter,%20and%20the%20plant-life%20was%20lacking%20signs%20of%20life.%20The%20second%20time%20I%20visited%20was%20in%20April.%20This%20was%20probably%20my%20preferred%20time%20of%20year%20to%20visit%20because%20it%20was%20warmer%20and%20the%20gardens%20didn%E2%80%99t%20look%20so%20dead.%20Also,%20I%20booked%20a%20biking%20tour,%20which%20I%20absolutely%20adored!%20Having%20the%20bikes%20meant%20that%20we%20were%20able%20to%20cover%20a%20lot%20more%20ground%20in%20a%20much%20shorter%20period%20of%20time.%20And,%20who%20doesn%E2%80%99t%20want%20to%20have%20a%20picnic%20along%20the%20gardens%20canal%20on%20a%20bright%20and%20sunny%20day?!%20Planning%20Your%20Visit%20to%20the%20Palace%20at%20Versailles%20From%20Paris%20As%20An%20Individual%20(Not%20Part%20of%20a%20Group%20Tour)%20Of%20course,%20it%20is%20possible%20to%20visit%20Versailles%20as%20an%20individual.%20And,%20as%20I%20mentioned%20above,%20this%20is%20how%20my%20husband%20and%20I%20arranged%20our%20visit%20the%20first%20time.%20My%20strong%20recommendation%20to%20you%20is%20to%20plan%20to%20take%20the%20train%20from%20Montparnasse%20Train%20Station.%20From%20this%20train%20station%20there%20are%20options%20to%20arrive%20at%20Versailles%20Chantiers%20in%2015%20minutes%20or%20less.%20From%20the%20Versailles%20Chantiers%20train%20station,%20you%20will%20have%20about%20a%2020%20minute%20walk%20to%20reach%20the%20Palace%20at%20Versailles.%20Alternatively,%20you%20could%20take%20the%20bus%20part%20of%20the%20way,%20but%20you%20will%20still%20have%20to%20walk%20part%20of%20the%20way%20as%20well.%20Small%20Group%20Tour%20It%E2%80%99s%20no%20secret.%20I%20absolutely%20LOVED%20my%20small%20group%20bike%20tour%20of%20Versailles.%20If%20you%20are%20interested%20in%20booking%20the%20same%20tour,%20you%20can%20do%20so%20on%20the%20AirBnb%20Experiences%20website.%20Just%20be%20sure%20to%20bring%20plenty%20of%20water,%20wear%20appropriate%20clothing/shoes,%20and%20come%20prepared%20to%20have%20a%20fantastic%20time!%207.%20Visit%20the%20Op%C3%A9ra%20Garnier%20(Palais%20Garnier)%20in%20Paris%20Are%20you%20familiar%20with%20the%20world-famous%20musical%20Phantom%20of%20the%20Opera?%20This%20magnificent%20building%20provides%20the%20setting%20for%20the%20novel%20(written%20by%20Gaston%20Lereaux)%20which%20inspired%20the%20musical%20(composed%20by%20Andrew%20Lloyd%20Webber).%20It%E2%80%99s%20lavish%20interior%20and%20extravagant%20details%20leave%20many%20visitors%20(including%20myself)%20speechless.%20Even%20if%20you%20are%20unable%20to%20attend%20a...nhttps://christinestravelgems.com/visit-paris-dont-miss-these-10-unique-experiences/)", I recommend it if you're really into coffee and a little bit nerdy", "score": 0.8377398, "raw_content": null}]
summary: This summary is based on three web pages regarding unique experiences in Paris.  One page (christinestravelgems.com) suggests activities such as a macaron-making class, exploring viewpoints of the Eiffel Tower, visiting the D'Orsay Museum and Sacré-Cœur Basilica, seeing the Wall of Love, and touring the Catacombs of Paris and the Palace of Versailles.  A Rick Steves forum post (ricksteves.com) mentions a sewer tour and a visit to the Pasteur Institute as unique experiences. Finally, a Reddit post (reddit.com) recommends a coffee experience at Substance Coffee.
